str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
From hupo and a derivative of eresso; an under-oarsman, i.e. subordinate.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
A household manager, a steward, guardian.
From a derivative of muo; a secret or 'mystery'.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
